name: Racing Tiny Penguin Dash
description:
Guide your penguin on an adventure through the polar ice!

Racing Tiny Penguin Dash is a FREE, simple and addicting game that's fun for all ages. Help your penguin keep stocked up on fish while avoiding the dangers of life on the ice!

How long can glide along unharmed on the ice? Can you collect enough fish to stay fat and satisfied? You'll start sliding faster and faster, so watch out for those polar bears and leopard seals!

Collect enough fish and you can unlock more crazy penguin characters for even more fun!


*** FEATURES ***

* Incredible endless gameplay means a new game every time
* Collect fish to unlock more characters
* Simple game controls good for both kids and adults
* Amazing graphics
* Game Center enabled
* Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch


Download Racing Tiny Penguin Dash right now while it's 100% FREE!
